Django.description: Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

Python.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively.

Java.description: Java is a general-purpose computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

JavaScript.description: JavaScript is a high-level, dynamic, untyped, and interpreted programming language.

SASS.description: Sass is a language that lets you add structure to your CSS files.

MongoDB.description: MongoDB is a document-oriented database program.

C++.description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language.

C.description: C is a general-purpose, imperative computer programming language.

Node.js.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript run-time environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a web browser.
